ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He who sees you when you stand up to pray
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who watches you when you get up,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Who observes you when you rise (to pray)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who can see whether you stand up
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Who watches you when you stand up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who sees you when you stand up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who sees you when you stand up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who sees thee when thou standest
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who seeth thee when thou standest up (to pray)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who sees you when you stand up [for prayer],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who seeth thee when thou standest up
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who sees you when you stand [for prayer],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who seeth thee standing forth (in prayer),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who sees you (O Muhammad SAW) when you stand up (alone at night for Tahajjud prayers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who sees you when you stand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He Who sees you when you rise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who sees you when you arise
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:218] Who sees you when you stand, for prayer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who seeth thee when thou standest up) in prayer,
